title: Sine and Cosine Graphs - comparing sine values

content.question: A point labeled P is marked on the circumference of the circle in quadrant 2. An angle labeled theta is drawn between the positive x axis and radius O P. ​The figure shows the terminal ray of angle <math alttext="theta"><semantics><mi>θ</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, in standard position, intersecting the unit circle at point <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane. The function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses z close parentheses equals sin z"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>z</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mi>z</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. For the angle <math alttext="beta"><semantics><mi>β</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> (not shown), <math alttext="pi over 2 less than beta less than theta"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo><</mo><mi>β</mi><mo><</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following is true?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="f open parentheses beta close parentheses less than f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>β</mi></mfenced><mo><</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="f open parentheses beta close parentheses greater than f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>β</mi></mfenced><mo>></mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="f open parentheses beta close parentheses equals f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>β</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

Depending on the value of <math alttext="beta"><semantics><mi>β</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, sometimes ​<math alttext="f open parentheses beta close parentheses less than f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>β</mi></mfenced><mo><</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and sometimes <math alttext="f open parentheses beta close parentheses greater than f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>β</mi></mfenced><mo>></mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

content.answer: ​<math alttext="f open parentheses beta close parentheses greater than f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>β</mi></mfenced><mo>></mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
